title: Leadership Practical Competency Enhancement: Robot Control System Design and Optimization Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain three or more external factors that degrade dynamic/static performance of robots
Learners can design a control system combining sliding mode control (SMC) and extended state observer (ESO)
Learners can improve robot controllers by applying machine learning-based parameter optimization techniques
Learners can verify tracking accuracy over 90% and disturbance suppression performance through 6-axis robot experiments
Learners can implement control algorithms using mobile-based simulation tools in constrained computing environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
